channel.title: Program that can split up the vocals, bass, guitar, etc
channel.description: Does anyone know of a program that when you import a song into it, it'll divide up the song by the vocals, bass, guitar, and drums so I can just like turn off the drums if I wanted to or turn off the vocals? I want this so I can turn the guitar part off and play to the song on guitar.

item.title: Program that can split up the vocals, bass, guitar, etc
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:6, topic:338063”][quote author=spy man47 link=topic=434461.msg3190431#msg3190431 date=1272202765]
Yes he is requesting one, btw nice Signutare… LMFaO!
[/quote]
This is the General Questions section and he’s asking for a program, not someone to coed his serbr.

@OP: Not sure, sorry.[/quote]
there are a few plugins for audacity, i can’t remember their names though

Read full topic
